scripts.preparations: npm run licenses && npm run write_date
scripts.dev: npm run preparations && webpack-dev-server --inline --progress --config build/webpack.dev.conf.js --mode development
scripts.nwjs-download-ressources: nwjs_version='v0.54.1'; if [ ! -f ressources/nwjs/nwjs-${nwjs_version}-linux-x64.tar.gz ]; then wget https://dl.nwjs.io/${nwjs_version}/nwjs-${nwjs_version}-linux-x64.tar.gz -P ressources/nwjs; fi
scripts.nwjs-download-ressources-sdk: nwjs_version='v0.54.1'; if [ ! -f ressources/nwjs/nwjs-sdk-${nwjs_version}-linux-x64.tar.gz ]; then wget https://dl.nwjs.io/${nwjs_version}/nwjs-sdk-${nwjs_version}-linux-x64.tar.gz -P ressources/nwjs; fi
scripts.nwjs-download-ressources-win: nwjs_version='v0.54.1'; if [ ! -f ressources/nwjs/nwjs-${nwjs_version}-win-x64.zip ]; then wget https://dl.nwjs.io/${nwjs_version}/nwjs-${nwjs_version}-win-x64.zip -P ressources/nwjs; fi
scripts.nwjs-build: npm run build && npm run nwjs-copy-assets
scripts.nwjs-app: nwjs_version='v0.54.1'; npm run nwjs-build && npm run nwjs-download-ressources && rm -rf dist_nwjs/nwjs-${nwjs_version}-linux-x64/ && mkdir -p dist_nwjs/nwjs-${nwjs_version}-linux-x64/ && tar -xvf ressources/nwjs/nwjs-${nwjs_version}-linux-x64.tar.gz --directory dist_nwjs/nwjs-${nwjs_version}-linux-x64/ && mv dist_nwjs/nwjs-${nwjs_version}-linux-x64/nwjs-${nwjs_version}-linux-x64/* dist_nwjs/nwjs-${nwjs_version}-linux-x64/ && rm -r dist_nwjs/nwjs-${nwjs_version}-linux-x64/nwjs-${nwjs_version}-linux-x64/ && cd dist && zip -r ../dist_nwjs/nwjs-${nwjs_version}-linux-x64/package.nw * && cd ../ && cat dist_nwjs/nwjs-${nwjs_version}-linux-x64/nw dist_nwjs/nwjs-${nwjs_version}-linux-x64/package.nw > dist_nwjs/nwjs-${nwjs_version}-linux-x64/start_genexvis && chmod +x dist_nwjs/nwjs-${nwjs_version}-linux-x64/start_genexvis && rm dist_nwjs/nwjs-${nwjs_version}-linux-x64/nw && cd dist_nwjs && mv nwjs-${nwjs_version}-linux-x64 GenExVis_Release_Linux_x64 && zip -r GenExVis_Release_Linux_x64.zip GenExVis_Release_Linux_x64 && rm -r GenExVis_Release_Linux_x64
scripts.nwjs-app-debug: nwjs_version='v0.54.1'; npm run nwjs-build && npm run nwjs-download-ressources-sdk && rm -rf dist_nwjs/nwjs-sdk-${nwjs_version}-linux-x64 && mkdir -p dist_nwjs/nwjs-sdk-${nwjs_version}-linux-x64 && tar -xvf ressources/nwjs/nwjs-sdk-${nwjs_version}-linux-x64.tar.gz --directory dist_nwjs/nwjs-sdk-${nwjs_version}-linux-x64/ && mv dist_nwjs/nwjs-sdk-${nwjs_version}-linux-x64/nwjs-sdk-${nwjs_version}-linux-x64/* dist_nwjs/nwjs-sdk-${nwjs_version}-linux-x64 && rm -r dist_nwjs/nwjs-sdk-${nwjs_version}-linux-x64/nwjs-sdk-${nwjs_version}-linux-x64 && cd dist && zip -r ../dist_nwjs/nwjs-sdk-${nwjs_version}-linux-x64/package.nw * && cd ../ && cat dist_nwjs/nwjs-sdk-${nwjs_version}-linux-x64/nw dist_nwjs/nwjs-sdk-${nwjs_version}-linux-x64/package.nw > dist_nwjs/nwjs-sdk-${nwjs_version}-linux-x64/start_genexvis && chmod +x dist_nwjs/nwjs-sdk-${nwjs_version}-linux-x64/start_genexvis && rm dist_nwjs/nwjs-sdk-${nwjs_version}-linux-x64/nw && cd dist_nwjs && mv nwjs-sdk-${nwjs_version}-linux-x64 GenExVis_Debug_Linux_x64 && zip -r GenExVis_Debug_Linux_x64.zip GenExVis_Debug_Linux_x64 && rm -r GenExVis_Debug_Linux_x64
scripts.nwjs-app-windows: nwjs_version='v0.54.1'; npm run nwjs-build && npm run nwjs-download-ressources-win && rm -rf dist_nwjs/nwjs-${nwjs_version}-win-x64/ && mkdir -p dist_nwjs/nwjs-${nwjs_version}-win-x64/ && unzip ressources/nwjs/nwjs-${nwjs_version}-win-x64.zip -d dist_nwjs/nwjs-${nwjs_version}-win-x64/ && mv dist_nwjs/nwjs-${nwjs_version}-win-x64/nwjs-${nwjs_version}-win-x64/* dist_nwjs/nwjs-${nwjs_version}-win-x64/ && rm -r dist_nwjs/nwjs-${nwjs_version}-win-x64/nwjs-${nwjs_version}-win-x64/ && cd dist && zip -r ../dist_nwjs/nwjs-${nwjs_version}-win-x64/package.nw * && cd ../ && cat dist_nwjs/nwjs-${nwjs_version}-win-x64/nw.exe dist_nwjs/nwjs-${nwjs_version}-win-x64/package.nw > dist_nwjs/nwjs-${nwjs_version}-win-x64/start_genexvis.exe && chmod +x dist_nwjs/nwjs-${nwjs_version}-win-x64/start_genexvis.exe && rm dist_nwjs/nwjs-${nwjs_version}-win-x64/nw.exe && cd dist_nwjs && mv nwjs-${nwjs_version}-win-x64 GenExVis_Release_Windows_x64 && zip -r GenExVis_Release_Windows_x64.zip GenExVis_Release_Windows_x64 && rm -r GenExVis_Release_Windows_x64
scripts.nwjs-app-buildall: npm run nwjs-app; npm run nwjs-app-debug; npm run nwjs-app-windows
